title: Banished (4R139)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert Saruman or an [Isengard] Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. Each time another ally or companion loses a skirmish, bearer must exert.
Lore:	”'Oh, but this is not from me - it comes from the King. He signed it this morning.'”
Rarity:	R
